name: MaDroid
description:
A science facility once filled with friendly and helpful droids became a slaughterhouse after a terrible virus made them go insane.  No one knows who is actually responsible for this madness but rogue droids kill everyone and everything on sight. It won't be easy but someone must find a way to end their tyranny  and restore peace in this science facility once again.

You will take the role of Douglas and try to solve various puzzles to progress through levels. Douglas is not fond of fighting and is wise to avoid mad droids. He can explore his surroundings and interact with the environment. Sadly, his strength has its limits and he can't carry everything around - only a few handful items in his pocket. He must use his mind to outsmart his opponents.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • LMB - select item in inventory section
  • E - interact/use selected item
  • Q - drop selected item

Note: we are a team of students. This is our first game and we've have done it as a project in university.
